name: Andrey Luiz
title: Senior Frontend Developer
summary: Frontend developer with 12+ years of experience, specializing in TypeScript, React, and modern frontend technologies. Conveined apps for Smart TVs and PS4, from development with React, to approval, and launch. Enhanced user experience and drove business growth at reputable Swiss firms like SonarSource and Scout24. Developed and launched React Native applications on Google Play and Apple Store, expanding company's reach in different countries.

experience.title: Senior Front-end Developer
achievements: Delivered three key features for SonarCloud's project section in React, integrating with RESTful APIs to enhance data retrieval and improve Clean Code Taxonomy integration and user education on coding best practices.
Pioneered CaYC team's adoption of 8 critical features, using React and TypeScript, streamlining workflow efficiency and cross-team collaboration.
Migrated SonarCloud's issues screen to MIUI using React, receiving positive feedback from senior leadership for improving the daily workflow of developers.

experience.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
achievements: Enhanced Equip app's map search and rental processes, using Svelte and TypeScript, reducing prototype development time by 3 months.
Launched the Equip app on Play Store and Apple Store, expanding the company's reach in three countries.
Refactored the Equip app's codebase, relying on React Native and TypeScript for improved maintainability and scalability.

experience.title: Senior Front-end Developer
achievements: Enhanced and refactored Anibis Messenger using React and TypeScript, getting positive reactions from management.
Migrated messaging services from Twilio to Sendbird, ensuring full adoption by 100% of users in the first month.

experience.title: Senior Front-end Developer
achievements: Conducted new features for the SkyQ application (British Sky Broadcasting), utilizing Redux for state management and local storage for optimized performance, improving user experience and availability in all countries where the product was present.
Authored and deployed key features for SkyQ on PlayStation 4, expanding product reach via successful store releases.

experience.title: Front-end Developer
achievements: Developed on startups in Brazil, such as Kanoah, DataRisk, and Resultados Digitais, as a Front-end Developer.
Championed important features for Kanoah Test Manager, a JIRA plugin for testing management, today part of Adaptavist.
Conveined the first version of the WYSIWYG landing page editor for RD Station, at Resultados Digitais.
Developed from ground up the first draft of the machine learning platform for DataRisk.
Take care of a family transition and relocate to another canton to explore new opportunities.
Deepen expertise in Rust, Python, and .NET to help guide future career decisions.
Build personal full-stack projects including andreyluiz.com, cv.andreyluiz.com, and others, to keep sharp skills.
Study how AI is shaping the future of software development, applied to senior engineers.
Begin job search on January 2025 looking for long-term impactful opportunities.

education.degree: Diploma in Software Engineering and Development
